title: Black widows seek hit men
itunes:title: Black widows seek hit men
description:
Most women who want their man dead are do-it-your-selfers, but there is a certain type of lady who outsources the dirty work to a hired hit man. Nancy Grace explores some of the more noteworthy cases with Dr. Brian Russell, the lawyer-psychologist who hosts Investigation Discovery's "Fatal Vows" series. They are joined by national criminal defense lawyer Brian Claypool, who defended one of the most infamous defendents Dalia Dippolito, and Crime Stories contributing reporter Bobbi Maxwell.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
